statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPKMSCryptokeys)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPKMSKeyrings)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPKMSLocations)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP KMS Cryptokeys that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPKMSCryptokeys)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:GCPKMSKeyrings)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPKMSLocations)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP GCPKMSCryptokeys-to-Keyrings relationships that are out of date.

statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPKMSKeyrings)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPKMSLocations)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP KMS Keyrings that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPKeyrings)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:GCPKMSLocations)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP GCPKeyrings-to-Location relationships that are out of date.

statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPKMSLocations)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP KMSLocations that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPKMSLocations)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP GCPKMSLocations-to-Project relationships that are out of date.

name: Cleanup GCP KMS Locations, Keyrings and Cryptokeys.
